title: A Whisper Of Love
presentation: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

v1: How I desire to love You with all my heart
So that my spirit is flooded with love for You.
v2: How I desire to taste the sweetness of love
So satisfied in love's wonderful melody.
v3: How I desire to know Your most loving Self
So my heart can be united with heav'nly love.
v4: How I desire to fully belong to You
So I will only abide in Your love's sweet rest.
v5: How I desire to love You with all my being
So I can share in the secret of love fore'er.
v6: How I desire to mingle with You in love
So fully one in the journey of love with You.
